boofcv.alg.sfm.d2
Class ImageMotionPointKey<I extends ImageSingleBand,T extends InvertibleTransform>

java.lang.Object
  boofcv.alg.sfm.d2.ImageMotionPointKey<I,T>
Type Parameters:
I - Input image type
T - Motion model data type
Direct Known Subclasses:
MotionMosaicPointKey, MotionStabilizePointKey
public class ImageMotionPointKey<I extends ImageSingleBand,T extends InvertibleTransform>
extends java.lang.Object

Computes the transform from the first image in a sequence to the current frame. Designed to be useful for stabilization and mosaic creation.

Author:
Peter Abeles

Constructor Detail

ImageMotionPointKey

public ImageMotionPointKey(ImagePointTracker<I> tracker,
                           ModelMatcher<T,AssociatedPair> modelMatcher,
                           ModelFitter<T,AssociatedPair> modelRefiner,
                           T model)
Specify algorithms to use internally. Each of these classes must work with compatible data structures.

Parameters:
tracker - feature tracker
modelMatcher - Fits model to track data
modelRefiner - (Optional) Refines the found model using the entire inlier set. Can be null.
model - Motion model data structure
Method Detail

public void setInitialTransform(T worldToInit)
Specifies the initially assumed transform from the world frame to the first image.

Parameters:
worldToInit - The transform.

reset

Makes the current frame the first frame and discards its past history

Transforms the world frame into another coordinate system.

Parameters:
oldWorldToNewWorld - Transform from the old world frame to the new world frame
